dependent_to.name: py-griffe
dependent_to.description:
Signatures for entire Python programs. Extract the structure, the frame,
the skeleton of your project, to generate API documentation or find
breaking changes in your API.

dependent_to.description: Automatic documentation from sources, for MkDocs.

dependent_to.description: Convert WSGI app to ASGI app or ASGI app to WSGI app.
